db:abstract.db:para: Demonstrates how one can combine custom materials and geometries under a single QQuickItem.

db:article.db:programlisting:
QT += core gui quick
TARGET = graph
TEMPLATE = app
SOURCES += main.cpp \ graph.cpp \ noisynode.cpp \ gridnode.cpp \ linenode.cpp
HEADERS += \ graph.h \ noisynode.h \ gridnode.h \ linenode.h
RESOURCES += \ graph.qrc
OTHER_FILES += \ main.qml \ shaders/noisy.vsh \ shaders/noisy.fsh \ shaders/line.fsh \ shaders/line.vsh
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/quick/scenegraph/graph INSTALLS += target
